body:
Mac users might care for a nicely rendered PDF of man pages via the Skim application.  I use the suggested alias 'manp' to execute the command, e.g.

%	manp  rvu

alias manp 	"man -t \!* | open -f -a Skim"

http://skim-app.sourceforge.net/

Best
John Mardaljevic
